subject: dried strawberries
body:
1\. started monday morning finding out i shipped a bad bug at work last week and felt so ughhhhhhhhhh but everyone was very nice about it and i was able to figure out what went wrong and how to fix it. 

2\. burnt end tacos, pickled green beans, dried strawberries. deborah painting watercolor flowers. at lunch, miso played fetch for the longest period of time she's ever played with me (still only a couple minutes, but i'll take it)

3\. deborah took a flattering photo of me (thankful for all flattering photos of me) lying in my underwear in a bean bag chair on the floor with miso stretched across my lap watching tv at magic hour
normalized_markdown:
1\. started monday morning finding out i shipped a bad bug at work last week and felt so ughhhhhhhhhh but everyone was very nice about it and i was able to figure out what went wrong and how to fix it. 

2\. burnt end tacos, pickled green beans, dried strawberries. deborah painting watercolor flowers. at lunch, miso played fetch for the longest period of time she's ever played with me (still only a couple minutes, but i'll take it)

3\. deborah took a flattering photo of me (thankful for all flattering photos of me) lying in my underwear in a bean bag chair on the floor with miso stretched across my lap watching tv at magic hour
